text: chea karpit nasa a l laoh ban ylprom champoh banda anak mean chomnue nowpel del puokke ban thveu kechch promoprieng cheamuoy anak( mou ham meat) now kraom daemchheu haey trong ban doeng nouv avei del mean nowknong chetd robsa puokke ning ban banhchouh pheap nungonr towleu puokke haey trongbratan aoy puokke nouv chychomneah knong pel chab
